TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit HasActivatableWorkflowEvent extends System.Runtime.DurableInstancing.InstancePersistenceEvent`1<class System.Activities.DurableInstancing.HasActivatableWorkflowEvent>
Public NotInheritable Class HasActivatableWorkflowEvent Inherits InstancePersistenceEvent(Of HasActivatableWorkflowEvent)

summary.span: 表示執行個體存放區引發的事件，該事件會通知泛型主機持續性資料庫中具有可啟動的執行個體。

span.span: Represents an event that an instance store raises to notify generic hosts about the existence of activatable instances in the persistence database.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 執行個體是*可啟動*，如果它不是暫停的狀態或已完成的狀態，並且滿足以下條件：An instance is *activatable*, if it is not in the suspended state or the completed state and satisfies the following conditions: - 執行個體是*runnable*。The instance is *runnable*. 如果滿足以下條件，則持續性資料庫中的執行個體會視為是可執行的：An instance in the persistence database is considered as runnable if it satisfies the following conditions: - 執行個體已解除鎖定，並具有已過期的暫止計時器。The instance is unlocked and has a pending timer that has expired. - 執行個體已解除鎖定，其狀態為**執行**。The instance is unlocked and its status is **Executing**. - 執行個體上有無效的鎖定。The instance has an invalid lock on it. - 電腦上沒有可以載入執行個體的工作流程主機。There is no workflow host capable of loading the instance is running on the computer. 執行個體存放區應定期搜尋可啟動的工作流程執行個體，而這些執行個體隸屬於使用該存放區的工作流程主機。An instance store should periodically search for activatable workflow instances that belong to a workflow host that uses the store. 在持續性存放區中找到可啟動的執行個體時，應引發 。It should raise the when it finds an activatable instance in the persistence store. 如果執行個體存放區在持續性存放區中找不到可啟動的執行個體，則應繼續監控持續性存放區，以尋找任何可啟動的執行個體。If the instance store does not find an activatable instance in the persistence store, it should continue to monitor the persistence store for any activatable instances. 引發 HasActivatableWorkflowEvent 後，執行個體存放區應停止監控持續性存放區中可啟動的執行個體，直到收到和執行 為止。After raising the HasActivatableWorkflowEvent, the instance store should stop monitoring the persistence store for activatable instances until it receives and executes the . 只有在命令執行未傳回任何可啟動的工作流程執行個體時，監控才會繼續執行。The monitoring continues only if the command execution does not return any activatable workflow instances. 當泛型主機收到這個事件時，會針對執行個體存放區執行 ，以取得建立工作流程主機所需的啟動參數。When a generic host receives this event, it executes the against the instance store to obtain activation parameters required to create a workflow host. 泛型主機會使用這些啟動參數建立工作流程主機，而後者則會載入和執行服務執行個體。The generic host uses these activation parameters to create a workflow host, which in turn loads and runs the service instance. WAS 啟動型別的啟動參數有：Site Name、Application Path (相對於網站) 和 Service Path (相對於應用程式)。The activation parameters for the WAS activation type are: Site Name, Application Path (relative to the site), and Service Path (relative to the application). 執行個體存放區可傳回這三個啟動參數的多組組合。An instance store could return multiple sets of these three activation parameters. 泛型主機是主機，擁有名為的 XName 參數**ActivationType**，且應設為執行個體存放區所支援的值。A generic host is a host that has an XName parameter named **ActivationType**, which should be set to a value supported by the instance store. 目前，SQL 工作流程執行個體存放區支援將 ActivationType 參數設定為值的泛型主機： **WAS**。Currently, the SQL Workflow Instance Store supports generic hosts with ActivationType parameter set to value: **WAS**. 如果 ActivationType 完全沒有設定，SQL 工作流程執行個體存放區會將主機視為泛型主機。If the ActivationType is not set at all, the SQL Workflow Instance Store treats the host as a generic host. > [!NOTE] > 程式碼隨附於名為"Dublin"(Application Server Extensions for.NET 4.0) 的工作流程管理服務是泛型主機，已啟動類型設定為**WAS**。The Workflow Management Service that ships with the code named "Dublin" (Application Server Extensions for .NET 4.0) is a generic host that has the activation type set to **WAS**.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.
